headline: Gear Up for Gartner (IT) Q2 Earnings: Wall Street Estimates for Key Metrics
summary: Looking beyond Wall Street's top-and-bottom-line estimate forecasts for Gartner (IT), delve into some of its key metrics to gain a deeper insight into the company's potential performance for the quarter ended June 2025.

headline: Proven Optics Named Emerging Vendor in Gartner’s 2025 Market Guide for IT Financial Management Tools
summary: COLUMBUS, Ohio, August 04, 2025--Proven Optics, a premier IT Financial Management (ITFM) solution provider, today announced its inclusion in Gartner's 2025 Market Guide for IT Financial Management Tools as an Emerging vendor – a designation given to companies demonstrating active market traction, notable capabilities, and growing customer interest, according to Gartner. This recognition underscores Proven Optics' commitment to delivering innovative solutions that help organizations modernize fin

headline: Gartner (IT) Q2 Earnings: What To Expect
summary: Research and advisory firm Gartner (NYSE:IT) will be reporting earnings this Tuesday before market hours. Here’s what investors should know.
